Verify the map canvas has a filter 'grayscale(10%)' applied
Verify the map's overflow property is 'hidden'
Open 'https://www.example.com'
Verify the header element is visible with background fill #ffffff, vertical dimension 60px, and stacking order 1000
Verify the 'Home' link has font family 'Arial', text size 16px, color #333333
Verify the 'Home' link has a 200ms transition on hover to color #007bff
Verify the logo image 'logo.png' is 100px wide and 40px high
Verify the language label has aria-label 'Language Selector'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button displays text 'Add to Cart' with background hue #28a745, text color #ffffff, and corner curvature 8px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button has 12px inner spacing on all sides, pointer style 'pointer', and is initially enabled
Verify on active state, the 'Add to Cart' button's scale changes to 0.98, and it has an element shadow '0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)'
Open 'https://www.store.com/item/456'
Verify the main product image has URL 'item_456_main.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x450px, and alternative description 'Stylish Red Jacket'
Verify the image is fully loaded within 500ms, has natural width 1200px, and object fit 'cover'
Verify the 'Email Address' input field displays placeholder text 'your@example.com', has border '1px solid #ced4da', and font size 15px
Verify the input label is 'Email Address' with font weight 500 and color #333333
Verify the input has 10px vertical padding and 15px horizontal padding
Verify each 'Service Feature' card has layout type 'flex', fixed width 300px, min height 180px, and background color #f8f9fa
Verify each 'Service Feature' card has 15px outer spacing below, 20px inner spacing, and element shadow '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Verify column gap is 10px and row gap is 10px for the cards
Locate the 'About Us' paragraph
Verify its font family is 'Georgia', text size 17px, line spacing 1.6, and text color #495057
Verify the text content is left-aligned, has a max width of 700px, and character spacing 0.5px
Verify no text decoration is applied to the 'About Us' paragraph
Verify the footer section has background color #343a40 and min height 100px
Verify the footer section contains exactly 4 navigation links
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link has href 'https://www.example.com/privacy', text color #adb5bd, and font size 14px
Verify the copyright text '© 2023 Example, Inc.' is present in the footer section
Trigger the 'Sign Up' modal
Verify the modal appears visible with stacking order 1050
Verify the modal backdrop has background color 'rgba(0,0,0,0.6)'
Verify the modal content box has width 500px, height 350px, and corner curvature 10px
Verify the modal's position is fixed and centered on the viewport
Inspect the 'Order History' table
Verify it displays exactly 10 rows
Verify each table row has '1px solid #dee2e6' border-bottom
Verify even table rows have background color #ffffff and odd rows have #f2f2f2
Verify each table row has 10px vertical inner spacing
Verify the column count for the table is 4
Verify the 'Order ID' column has text overflow 'ellipsis'
Open the 'Product Demo' video
Verify its URL is 'https://www.cdn.com/demo.mp4', width 800px, height 450px, and it is initially muted
Verify the video plays for at least 10 seconds
Verify the video has a poster image 'demo_poster.jpg' and controls are visible
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar element is visible, has vertical dimension 8px, background color #007bff, and corner curvature of 4px
Verify its horizontal dimension updates from 0% to 100% over 5 seconds with a linear motion effect
Verify the progress bar has aria-valuenow set to its current percentage
Locate the shopping cart icon in the header
Verify it is a SVG element with fill color #333333, width 24px, height 24px, and pointer style 'pointer'
Verify its clickable area is at least 32x32px and has a title attribute 'Shopping Cart'
Verify aria-hidden is true for the shopping cart icon
Open the language selector dropdown
Verify it shows exactly 5 options
Verify the currently selected option has value 'en-US' and displays text 'English'
Verify the dropdown has a border of '1px solid #ced4da' when closed
Verify the dropdown's font size is 16px
Verify the arrow icon rotates 180 degrees when open
Navigate to the image carousel on the homepage
Verify it displays 3 slides
Verify each slide has horizontal dimension 100% of its parent, vertical dimension 400px, and an animation duration of 500ms for slide changes
Verify the navigation dots count matches the total slide count and are visible
Verify the embedded map component has horizontal dimension 100% and vertical dimension 400px
Verify its URL contains 'https://maps.google.com/embed?'
Verify the map displays at least 3 location markers
Verify the map border is '1px solid #e0e0e0' and it has a box shadow '0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Locate the login page
Verify the 'Remember me' checkbox is visible, initially unchecked, and its associated label text is 'Remember me'
Verify the checkbox element has an outer spacing-right of 8px and a pointer style 'pointer'
Verify its accessibility role is 'checkbox'
Perform a successful form submission
Verify a toast notification appears
Verify the toast notification has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, inner spacing 15px, corner curvature 5px
Verify the toast notification is positioned fixed at bottom 20px, right 20px, for 3000ms
Verify its opacity is 1 and it contains a clickable close icon
Locate the 'Upload Resume' file input
Verify its placeholder text is 'No file chosen'
Verify the associated button displays 'Choose File'
Verify it accepts '.pdf,.doc,.docx' file types
Verify the input area has a width of 250px and a border of '1px dashed #cccccc'
Verify the current file count is 0 initially
Locate the 'Departure Date' input field
Verify its initial value is empty, placeholder is 'YYYY-MM-DD', text size 16px
Verify a calendar icon is visible at its right
Verify it prevents selection of dates before today
Verify it has a border color of #ced4da and background color #ffffff
Locate the content area with overflow
Verify it has 'overflow-y: scroll', max vertical dimension 300px, and vertical scroll position is 0px initially
Verify the scrollbar width is 15px
Verify the background color of the scrollable content is #fdfdfd
Verify scroll-behavior is 'smooth'
